mapper.select: select * from (select vr.*, row_number() over(order by 1) rown from (select substr(to_char(visit), 1, 9) dateis, count(*) visitCount from visit group by substr(to_char(visit), 1, 9) order by 1 desc) vr) where rown between 1 and 12 order by rown desc
select gender, count(gender) genderCount from member where gender is not null group by gender order by 1

select joinPath, count(joinPath) pathCount from (select case when joinPath = '지인 추천' then '지인 추천' when joinPath = '''Hello World!'' 검색' then 'Hello World 검색' when joinPath = '''프로젝트 모집'' 검색' then '프로젝트 모집 검색' else '기타' end joinPath from member) group by joinPath order by 1
select memLevel, count(memLevel) levelCount from member where memLevel ='2' or memLevel='3' group by memLevel order by memLevel

select (substr((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - to_char(birth, 'YYYY') + 1),1,1))||'0대' generation, count(substr((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - to_char(birth, 'YYYY') + 1),1,1)) gCount from member where birth is not null group by substr((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - to_char(birth, 'YYYY') + 1),1,1) order by 1

select * from (select id, nickName, memLevel, point, lastLogin, profileImg, row_number() over(order by point desc, lastLogin desc) rown from member where memLevel >= 2 and point is not null) where rown between 1 and 5

select dateis, nvl(newBoard, 0) newBoard, nvl(delBoard, 0) delBoard from (select ab.*, row_number() over(order by 1) rown from (select nb.dateis, newBoard, delBoard from (select substr(to_char(new), 1, 9) dateis, count(*) newBoard from newBoardLog group by substr(to_char(new), 1, 9)) nb join (select substr(to_char(del), 1, 9) dateis, count(*) delBoard from delBoardLog group by substr(to_char(del), 1, 9)) db on nb.dateis = db.dateis(+)) ab) where rown between 1 and 5 order by 1

select dateis, nvl(newcom,0) newCom, nvl(delcom,0) delCom from (select ab.*, row_number() over(order by 1) rown from (select nb.dateis, newCom, delCom from (select substr(to_char(new), 1, 9) dateis, count(*) newCom from newComLog group by substr(to_char(new), 1, 9)) nb join (select substr(to_char(del), 1, 9) dateis, count(*) delCom from delComLog group by substr(to_char(del), 1, 9)) db on nb.dateis = db.dateis(+)) ab) where rown between 1 and 5 order by 1
